en.about_me_content: I hold a degree in Software Development from Auckland University of Technology, where I specialized in Java, object-oriented programming, and agile development methodologies. Additionally, I pursued independent study in diverse areas such as C++, Arduino, C#, and Unity 2D for game development.
en.about_me_content_2: Throughout my university journey, I had the privilege of serving as a peer mentor, guiding and supporting new computer science students. This experience reinforced my belief in the value of continuous learning and growth, which ultimately motivated me to embark on the creation of this website. Together, let's embrace the spirit of progress and keep moving forward.
en.updating: Thanks for your visiting, this project will continuously updating...

zh.about_me_content: 我毕业于奥克兰理工大学，主修软件开发。在大学期间深入的学习了Java和面向对象编程理论和团队开发的敏捷型开发框架。同时出于个人兴趣，我独立学习了C++ 与Arduino开发，还有使用C#和Unity 2D的游戏开发。此外，在大学期间曾任职于本学院作为Peer Mentor辅导计算机新生的编程作业。 科技行业不断的变化和升级，面对挑战、克服困难，是每一个程序员都要习惯的日常。保持积极的学习态度，不断提升自己，这是我创建这个网站的初衷。愿我们都能无限进步。
zh.updating: 感谢您的关注，我的项目仍在持续更新中...
